Safe Food for Canadians Act
SubjectSafe Food for Canadians Regulations
PrecisSAFE FOOD FOR CANADIANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) apply internationally recognized standards for food safety to food that is imported or prepared in Canada for interprovincial trade or for export; (2) support market access for Canadian exporters by keeping pace with food safety modernization efforts in other countries; and (3) consolidate 13 food commodity-based regulations plus the food-related provisions of the Consumer Packaging and Labelling Regulations to a single set of more outcome-based requirements (i.e. requiring an expected result instead of listing steps to achieve the expected result), where appropriate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0108 Publication Date: 2018-06-13
AttachmentsAttachment
